description: Try our easy to follow Fast Mediterranean Meatballs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meatballs,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,Pork,Mar 2020,Dinner Made Easy
name: Fast Mediterranean Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 semi dried tomatoes in Mediterranean herbs (drained)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add meatballs. Cook for 7 minutes, turning occasionally, or until browned.
Add pasta sauce and semi dried tomatoes. Cook for 7 minutes or until sauce has thickened and meatballs are cooked through.
Toss salad and balsamic dressing from the kit together in a large bowl.
Divide meatballs among bowls and serve with salad.
